verbose_text: Class II associated invariant chain peptide (CLIP), a polypeptide involved in the formation and transport of major histocompatibility complex (MHC) class II protein, also known as CD74, binds to the MHC class II groove and shields the epitope binding site until the MHC receptor is fully assembled [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
evidence: Class II-associated invariant chain peptide (CLIP), a polypeptide involved in the formation and transport of major histocompatibility complex (MHC) class II protein, also known as CD74, binds to the MHC class II groove
